snippet: The bombing Tuesday, in a bazaar in the capital of Faryab Province, was the latest major attack in the lead-up to presidential elections next month.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and HARIS KAKAR

lead_paragraph: The bombing Tuesday, in a bazaar in the capital of Faryab Province, was the latest major attack in the lead-up to presidential elections next month.

headline.main: Suicide Bomber Kills at Least 16 in Northern Afghanistan
